CareTaxonomy.name: CareTaxonomy
CareTaxonomy.description: Represents a static list of taxonomy codes.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this taxonomy is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this taxonomy is no longer effective.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the taxonomy master record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentTaxonomyId.description: The parent taxonomy associated with a care taxonomy.
